resources.string: Battle Pass Helper
"Battle Pass Helper - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lastbit.battlepass
"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lastbit.battlepass
FAQ
Battle Pass Helper
Week
I can’t open certain weeks, why?
As soon as weekly tips will be added, you will have access to them and receive a notification about it.
I don’t understand how tips work.

On the first image, you have a list of challenges for the selected week, near it you will find marks, which are displayed on the map. Each mark resembles a challenge. Even if the challenge list is not available for the language you choose, you can use marks to visually identify where challenges are. Challenges are displayed is the same order for everyone.
When I select a certain week, I can only see an empty background instead of images.
Images are downloaded via the internet. Check whether you have a stable connection, if your connection is weak it can take some time in order for images to load.
How do I make the image bigger?
Double tap on the image you want to make it bigger or use pinch to zoom in order to increase or decrease the size.
How long does it take for tips to appear in the app after challenges are published in the game?
Within 1 hour after they added in the game.
I can’t find a secret star or banner using your tips
Secret stars / banners become available only when you complete all weekly battle pass challenges
I want to complete the challenges. How do I get a battle pass?
In order to get a battle pass, you will need to purchase it in the game or buy it from the official website.
Are there going to be tips for the next season?
Yes, as soon as the current season ends, tips for next season will be available in the app.
This week is locked and will open
